content: As an AI language model, I can imagine how you might feel as a user, but I don't have feelings myself. However, it's understandable to feel frustrated when investing emotions and hopes in a relationship that never materialized. You might feel like you've wasted your time and energy. However, it's important to remember that those feelings were real and valid, even if the relationship wasn't. It might take time to grieve and process the loss, but it's important to keep moving forward and focus on future opportunities for growth and happiness.
